verses.roman:
sahasra daṇḍavat kare, laya lakṣa nāma
dui sahasra vaiṣṇavere nitya paraṇāma

synonyms: sahasra—thousand; daṇḍavat—obeisances; kare—does; laya—takes; lakṣa—one hundred thousand; nāma—holy names; dui—two; sahasra—thousand; vaiṣṇavere—unto the devotees; nitya—daily; paraṇāma—obeisances.
translation: As a daily duty, he regularly offered one thousand obeisances to the Lord, chanted at least one hundred thousand holy names and offered obeisances to two thousand Vaiṣṇavas.
